alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central El Paso County through 700 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peyton, or 23 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central El Paso County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
